trans-unit.source: Replaces the standard common language runtime (CLR) free-threaded marshaler with the standard OLE STA marshaler.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o marshaler free-thread padrão do CLR (Common Language Runtime) pelo marshaler OLE STA padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject> class prevents calls made into a hosting object by OLE from entering threads other than the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject> classe evita que as chamadas feitas em um objeto de hospedagem pelo OLE insiram threads que não seja o thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You should derive your class from the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject> class to gain this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de classe a partir de <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject> classe para obter essa funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject" />.

trans-unit.source: You should derive your class from the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject> class-.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de classe a partir de <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject> classe-.
